name: Leaf 3 Core
description: These are projects built using a basic Leaf 3 scaffold.

products.name: Complete authentication system
products.description: This project is a complete authentication system built with Leaf 3. It includes a full user registration system, email verification, password reset, and more.

products.name: Complete authentication system (Dockerized)
products.description: This project is a complete authentication system built with Leaf 3 and docker. It includes a full user registration system, email verification, password reset, and more.
